heroHeadline: GUEMAR - Contemporary Homes in Aguas Nuevas, Costa Blanca
heroIntro:
GUEMAR brings modern residential developments to the Costa Blanca, with a focus on quality construction and thoughtful design. Currently showcasing 3 exceptional properties within the GOMERA STAR development, perfectly positioned in the growing Aguas Nuevas area. Their approach combines contemporary architecture with practical living spaces, catering to both permanent residents and holiday home seekers.

The GOMERA STAR development represents GUEMAR's commitment to creating well-planned communities that enhance the coastal lifestyle. Each property has been designed with attention to detail, offering excellent value within this sought-after region. Our agency is pleased to present this curated selection of GUEMAR homes to discerning buyers looking for quality new build properties on the Costa Blanca.

aboutSection.title: About GUEMAR
aboutSection.content:
GUEMAR has established itself as a thoughtful developer in the Costa Blanca market, focusing on residential properties that balance modern amenities with sustainable design principles. Their portfolio demonstrates a commitment to understanding local market demands and creating homes that appeal to diverse buyer profiles.

The developer's projects reflect careful planning and attention to community infrastructure. GUEMAR properties are positioned in areas with good connectivity, local amenities, and growth potential. Their developments are characterised by quality finishes and practical layouts that serve real lifestyle needs rather than following trends.

specializationSection.title: Development Focus
specializationSection.content: GUEMAR specialises in residential developments that serve the Costa Blanca's diverse property market. The Aguas Nuevas location offers accessibility to both established amenities and future growth areas, making it an attractive choice for investors and homeowners alike. GOMERA STAR represents their current focus, delivering contemporary homes with modern specifications in a well-structured development setting. The developer's approach emphasises value and livability, creating properties suited to both long-term residents and those seeking investment opportunities in this dynamic region.

qualitySection.title: Quality & Specifications
features: Modern architectural design and contemporary finishes
Quality construction with certified building materials

qualitySection.content: GUEMAR properties are built to modern construction standards with careful attention to finish quality. Each home incorporates contemporary specifications that meet current lifestyle expectations, from efficient electrical systems to durable materials selected for the coastal environment. The developments feature well-planned layouts that maximise space and functionality, with quality fittings and professional finishes throughout. Residents benefit from properly maintained communal areas and reliable building infrastructure designed for long-term durability.
